trans-unit.source: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 显示使用户能够选择日期并移到下一步或上一个月份月的日历。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the Calendar control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [可访问性](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 介绍使用日历控件在网页上显示单个月份的日历。

trans-unit.source: The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以选择日期并移到下一步或上一个月份。

trans-unit.source: The Calendar control supports all the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName> types in the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 日历控件支持所有<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>中的类型<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间。</xref:System.Globalization> </xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar.
trans-unit.target: 除了公历，这还包括不同年份和月份系统，例如 Hjiri 日历使用的日历。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the Calendar control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定是否月历控件允许你通过设置中选择一天、 周或整月<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该控件显示月份中的天标头的星期日期，使用月份名称和年、 用于选择各个月中的日期，链接和将移动到下一步和上一个月的链接的标题。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the Calendar control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于控制控件的不同部分的样式的属性，可以自定义日历控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了指定的不同部分的控件的样式的属性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the title section.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for today's date.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the weekend dates.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>|指定的样式部分，其中显示星期几。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>|指定在显示的月份日期的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A>|在标题部分中指定的导航控件的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>|指定不在当前显示的月份日期的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>|在选定日期的日历上指定的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>|指定周和月份日期选择列的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A>|指定的标题部分的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>|指定为今天的日期的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>|指定周末日期的样式。 | 你还可以显示或隐藏的控件的不同部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出用于控制哪些部分是显示还是隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>|Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A>|Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>|Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A>|Shows or hides the title section.| Although binding to a data source is not supported for the Calendar control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>|显示或隐藏显示一周中的各天的部分。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A>|显示或隐藏月份中的天之间的网格线。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>|显示或隐藏的下一步或上一个月份的导航控件。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A>|显示或隐藏标题部分。 | 虽然月历控件不支持绑定到数据源，你可修改的内容和格式设置的各个日期单元格。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the Calendar control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上显示月历控件之前，它将创建并汇编构成控件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the Calendar control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>创建日历控件中的每个日期单元格时引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制内容，因为它的日期单元格的格式提供事件处理程序中的代码是否创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Calendar control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Calendar 控件呈现为客户端浏览器 ECMAScript （JScript、 JavaScript）。

trans-unit.source: The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 客户端浏览器必须具有 ECMAScript 对于此控件启用才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards.
trans-unit.target: # # 辅助功能默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text value that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置日历标题为呈现一个文本值。

trans-unit.source: A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences.
trans-unit.target: 表标题用于描述一到三个句子中的表的性质。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A> property to align the caption with the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>属性使用日历标题的对齐。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The table caption.
trans-unit.target: 表标题中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现文本的对齐方式为标题日历。

trans-unit.source: This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定标题相对于出现的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>, which lets the browser determine where to align the caption.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>，它可让浏览器确定要将对齐标题位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: The following table explains the relationship between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value and the appearance of the caption.
trans-unit.target: 下表说明之间的关系<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>值和标题的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value|Appearance| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.| |`Left`|The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.| |`NotSet`|The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.| |`Right`|The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.| |`Top`|The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.|
trans-unit.target: |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>值 |外观 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|标题文本居中显示在日历上，底部。 | |`Left`|标题将显示在日历上，使用左对齐的文本的顶部。 | |`NotSet`|标题对齐未设置，并由浏览器。 | |`Right`|标题将显示在日历上，使用右对齐的文本的顶部。 | |`Top`|标题文本居中显示日历的顶部。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> value that indicates the alignment of the caption.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref>值，该值指示标题的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定单个单元格的大小。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 将此属性设置为`-1`指示呈现的表中未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距 （以像素为单位） 量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_2" name="2" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_2" name="2" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell padding is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的单元格填充为小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制在日历中的各个单元格之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 在垂直方向和水平应用此间距。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 将此属性设置为`-1`指示呈现的表中未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: 单元格之间的间距 （以像素为单位） 量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell spacing is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的单元格间距是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于存储子控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method is primarily of interest to control developers who extend the functionality of the Calendar control.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlCollection 方法是主要由控件开发人员扩展月历控件的功能。

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternalControlCollection" name="InternalControlCollection" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_InternalControlCollection" name="InternalControlCollection" href=""></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示的一周的某天的部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定显示一周中的各天的部分的样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The name format for the days of the week is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 每周天数的名称格式由控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>包含显示一周的某天的部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name format for days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每周日期名称格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the DayNameFormat property to specify the name format for the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: DayNameFormat 属性用于指定一周中的天的名称格式。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the days of the week are displayed as the full name, short (abbreviated) name, first letter of the day, or first two letters of the day.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定是否每周天数显示为完整的名称，短 （缩写） 的名称、 一天中的第一个字母或一天中的前两个字母。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The day names are based on the server's local settings.
trans-unit.target: 星期几名称基于服务器的本地设置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified day name format is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期名称格式不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件层次结构中创建每一天时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 每一天创建控件层次结构中时引发此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不支持数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The DayRender event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: 将引发 DayRender 事件时的每一天中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>创建控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the DayRender event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的内容和格式的日期单元格，为 DayRender 事件提供事件处理程序中的代码创建时。

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the DayRender event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于 DayRender 事件引发时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: 你仅可以添加静态控件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示的月份中日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的中显示的月份日期的样式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify a different style for the selected date, weekend dates, dates not in the currently displayed month, or today's date, these dates will also be displayed using the style specified by the DayStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果未为所选的日期、 周末日期、 不在当前显示的月份日期或今天的日期指定不同的样式，这些日期也会显示使用 DayStyle 属性指定的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> properties to specify alternative styles for these dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>属性以指定备用样式，这些日期。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>天显示的月份中包含的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一周中的第一天列显示中的天<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the FirstDayOfWeek property to specify the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: FirstDayOfWeek 属性用于指定在一周的第一天列中显示星期几<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: You can specify any day of the week or `FirstDayOfWeek.Default`, which indicates that the date is determined by the system settings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定一周中的任何一天或`FirstDayOfWeek.Default`，指示日期由系统设置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the day specified in the system setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""> </xref>，指示是否使用系统设置中指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: The date specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期不是一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> object contains week selectors.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>对象包含每周选择器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> values `DayWeek` and `DayWeekMonth` both contain week selectors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>值`DayWeek`和`DayWeekMonth`都包含周选择器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> contains week selectors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>包含周选择器; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads a saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载已保存的状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved condition of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> ，其中包含的保存的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为下一个月导航控件显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the NextMonthText property to provide custom text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: NextMonthText 属性用于提供下一个月导航控件的自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性连同常用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>要提供一组自定义导航控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the NextMonthText property.
trans-unit.target: 因为此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，则可以指定用于 NextMonthText 属性的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 下一步的月导航控件的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_"&gt;"" name=""&gt;"" href=""></xref>, which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_"&gt;"" name=""&gt;"" href=""> </xref>，它呈现为大于号 (>)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the next and previous month navigation elements in the title section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置下一步和上一个月的格式，请导航元素中的标题部分<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPrevFormat property to specify the format for the next and previous month navigation elements on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 NextPrevFormat 属性来指定下一步和上一个月导航元素的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the text for the navigation controls is displayed as the full month name, the short (abbreviated) month name, or custom text.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定是否将导航控件的文本显示为完整的月份名称、 短 （缩写） 的月份名称或自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: To specify custom navigation text, set this property to `NextPrevFormat.CustomText` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> properties to the custom text.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义导航文本，请将此属性设置为`NextPrevFormat.CustomText`并设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>属性设置为自定义的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomText" name="CustomText" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomText" name="CustomText" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified format is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取下一步和上一个月导航元素的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定下一步和上一个月导航元素的样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style properties for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: 下一步和上一个月导航元素的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件，并允许您提供的自定义处理程序<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不支持数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时的每一天中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>创建控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>对象包含可用于以编程方式控制日期单元格的格式的两个属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property represents the cell being rendered, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A> property represents the date to render in the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>属性表示单元格呈现，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A>属性表示要呈现的单元格中的日期。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过动态添加到的控件定义单元格的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>时呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>时引发事件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: 你仅可以添加静态控件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDayRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDayRender 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> that contains information about the cell to render.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> ，包含有关要呈现的单元格的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"></xref> that contains information about the day to render.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"> </xref> ，包含有关下班时间来呈现信息。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件，并允许您提供的自定义处理程序<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>时用户选择一天、 周或整月，通过单击日期选择器控件将引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSelectionChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件，并允许您提供的自定义处理程序<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation elements on the title section.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>用户单击的标题部分的一个或下一个月导航元素时引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The OnVisibleMonthChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnVisibleMonthChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the month currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> ，它表示当前在所显示月份<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the previous month displayed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>表示显示上个月<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 获取的样式属性天上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>不在所显示月份的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性中的天上指定的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>不在所显示月份的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the OtherMonthDayStyle property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 OtherMonthDayStyle 属性，在指定的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>使用属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for the days on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>其中包含的样式属性天<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>不在所显示月份的控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为上一个月份导航控件显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the PrevMonthText property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: PrevMonthText 属性用于提供自定义文本的上一个月份导航控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性连同常用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>要提供一组自定义导航控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the PrevMonthText property.
trans-unit.target: 因为此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，则可以指定用于 PrevMonthText 属性的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 上个月导航控件的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_"&lt;"" name=""&lt;"" href=""></xref>, which is rendered as the less than sign (<).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_"&lt;"" name=""&lt;"" href=""> </xref>，它呈现为小于号 (<)。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引发的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控制当回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the event argument passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示传递到事件处理程序的事件自变量。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 显示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>客户端上的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>包含在客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Stores the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 存储的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含的已保存的状态的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所选的日期。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedDate property to determine the selected date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedDate 属性用于确定所选的日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDate property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: SelectedDate 属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合密切相关。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, SelectedDate and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允许仅选择一个日期，SelectedDate 的模式下和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等于 1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, SelectedDate and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允许多个日期选择，SelectedDate 的模式和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDate property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用设置 SelectedDate 属性<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDate property is updated to the selected date.
trans-unit.target: SelectedDate 属性更新为所选日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection is also updated to contain just this date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合也会更新以包含只是此日期。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Both the SelectedDate property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> SelectedDate 属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合均被更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the SelectedDate property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用替代日期选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>事件处理程序来手动设置 SelectedDate 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>时以编程方式设置此属性，不会不获取引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the selected date.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> ，表示所选的日期。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the selected dates on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>表示的选定的日期的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedDates collection to determine the currently selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedDates 集合用于在确定当前所选的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the SelectedDates collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>密切相关属性和 SelectedDates 集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，一种模式，允许仅选择一个日期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等于 1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允许多个的日期选择的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDates property stores a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: SelectedDates 属性存储的集合<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a week or month on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择一周或每月上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The selected dates are added to the SelectedDates collection, replacing the previous contents.
trans-unit.target: 所选的日期添加到 SelectedDates 集合，替换以前的内容。

trans-unit.source: The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date.
trans-unit.target: 以升序按日期排序的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is also updated to contain the first date in the SelectedDates collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性也会更新以包含 SelectedDates 集合中的第一个日期。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the SelectedDates collection to programmatically select dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 SelectedDates 集合以编程方式选择上的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the SelectedDates collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A>用于以编程方式操作 SelectedDates 集合中的选定的日期的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the SelectedDates collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性和 SelectedDates 集合以更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the SelectedDates collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用替代日期选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>事件处理程序来手动设置 SelectedDates 集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>时以编程方式设置此集合，将不会引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects representing the selected dates on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含一套<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>对象上表示的选定的日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected dates.
trans-unit.target: 获取的选定日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定在选定日期的样式上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the SelectedDayStyle property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 SelectedDayStyle 属性，在指定的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>使用属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择一天、 一周或整月通过单击日期选择器控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: 当用户通过单击日期选择器控件中选择一天、 一周或整月时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date selection mode on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control that specifies whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置上的日期选择模式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件，用于指定用户是否可以选择一天，一周或整月。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectionMode property to specify the date selection mode on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectionMode 属性上指定的日期选择模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month, or you can disable date-selection capability entirely.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定用户可以选择一天、 周或整月，还是可以完全禁用日期选择功能。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, an additional selector column that contains week and month selection controls is displayed in the first column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，包含周和月份选择控件的其他选择器列中的第一列显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A> property to customize the appearance of this column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>属性可自定义此列的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To disable date selection, set this property to `CalendarSelectionMode.None`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用日期选择，请将此属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.None`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Day" name="Day" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Day" name="Day" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified selection mode is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的选择模式不是一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为月份选择元素选择器列中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectMonthText property to provide custom text for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: SelectMonthText 属性用于选择器列中的月所选内容元素提供自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the SelectMonthText property.
trans-unit.target: 因为此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，则可以指定用于 SelectMonthText 属性的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。

trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: If the TodayDayStyle property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for today's date on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>其中包含的样式属性为今天的日期<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for today's date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为今天的日期的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the TodaysDate property to determine today's date.
trans-unit.target: TodaysDate 属性用于确定今天的日期。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically set the value for today's date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式设置值为今天的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用设置<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This date might need to be adjusted to accommodate users who are in a different time zone.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此日期可能需要进行调整以适应不同的时区中的用户。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the date specified by the TodaysDate property can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用自定义 TodaysDate 属性指定的日期的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property is not set, the date specified by the TodaysDate property determines which month is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A>未设置属性、 TodaysDate 属性指定的日期确定在显示的月份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the value that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> considers to be today's date.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>包含值的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>将其视为可今天的日期。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not explicitly set, this date will be the date on the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置此属性，此日期将在服务器上的日期。

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control view state.
trans-unit.target: 将标记的起始点，若要开始对控件的跟踪并保存更改的控件视图状态的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to render the table header <xref uid="langword_csharp_<th>" name="<th>" href=""></xref> HTML element for the day headers instead of the table data <xref uid="langword_csharp_<td>" name="<td>" href=""></xref> HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否呈现表头<xref uid="langword_csharp_<th>" name="<th>" href=""></xref>而不是表数据天标头的 HTML 元素<xref uid="langword_csharp_<td>" name="<td>" href=""> </xref> HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The table header `<th>` HTML element is used for day header cells by default.
trans-unit.target: 表头`<th>`默认情况下为一天的标头单元格使用 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: You can revert to the .NET Framework version 1.0 behavior of using `<td>` elements for day header cells by setting this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以还原到使用的.NET Framework 1.0 版行为`<td>`通过将此属性设置为一天标题单元格的元素`false`。

trans-unit.source: Note that changing this value can affect scripts that rely on the rendering behavior of the version 1.0 edition of this control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，更改此值可能会影响依赖于此控件的版本 1.0 版本的呈现行为的脚本。

trans-unit.source: The use of the `<th>` element might also alter the visible rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in browsers by making the day header cells center-aligned and bold.
trans-unit.target: 使用`<th>`元素也可能会改变的可见呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>中变得日标头单元格居中对齐、 加粗的浏览器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<th>" name="<th>" href=""></xref> element is used for day header cells; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<td>" name="<td>" href=""></xref> element is used for day headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_<th>" name="<th>" href=""></xref>元素用于日标头单元格;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_<td>" name="<td>" href=""></xref>元素用于天标头。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.DateTime> value that specifies the month to display on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.DateTime>值，该值指定要在上显示的月份<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Use the VisibleDate property to programmatically set the month to display on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 VisibleDate 属性以编程方式设置要在上显示的月份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The specified date can be any date in the month you want to display, although it is common to use the first date in the month.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期可以是任何你想要显示，但是很常见的是使用在每月的第一个日期的月份中的日期。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用设置<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The VisibleDate property is updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: VisibleDate 属性更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can provide a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A> event handler to set the VisibleDate property and override the automatically generated value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以提供自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A>事件处理程序来设置 VisibleDate 属性并且覆盖自动生成的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the month to display on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> ，它指定要在上显示的月份<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>, which displays the month that contains the date specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>，它会显示包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate*>所指定的日期的月份

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation controls on the title heading.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击下一步或上个月导航控件的标题标头上时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation elements on the title heading.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击的标题标头的一个或下一个月导航元素时，将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。
